mapper.select: SELECT ci.designer AS designer, ci.ACNumber AS acNumber, ci.contract_id AS contractId, ci.contract_total AS contractTotal, rp.代采金额 as purchaseAgentFee, bc.变更总价 as projectChangeTotal, ISNULL(hr.已付, 0) AS customerPay, hr.已付 / ci.contract_total AS payContractRatio, hr.已付 / (ci.contract_total + ISNULL(bc.变更总价, 0)) AS payProjectRatio, CASE ci.state WHEN 9 THEN '归档' WHEN 8 THEN '结算' WHEN 7 THEN '竣工' WHEN 6 THEN '在建' END AS contractState, derivedtbl_1.ACName AS branch, ci.contract_date AS contractDate, ci.actual_start_time AS actualStartTime, ci.actual_end_time AS actualEndTime, ci.end_balance AS balanceTime, View_Max_Flow_Form.CustName as customerName FROM Contract_Info AS ci INNER JOIN View_Max_Flow_Form ON ci.ACNumber = View_Max_Flow_Form.ACNumber LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ID, ACType, ACName, ACCont, ACNumb, ACOrder, ACLogic, ACText FROM AC_Set WHERE (ACType = '营业网点')) AS derivedtbl_1 ON View_Max_Flow_Form.Branch = derivedtbl_1.ACNumb LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT 受理编号, SUM(数量 * 单价) AS 代采金额 FROM ERP_Replace_Purchase WHERE (状态 = 6) GROUP BY 受理编号) AS rp ON ci.ACNumber = rp.受理编号 LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT h1.ACNumber, SUM(CASE WHEN h1.财务确认 = 1 OR v1.source = '东方CJ' AND h1.Account1 IN ('定金', '上门费') AND h1.received = 1000 THEN h1.Received ELSE 0 END) AS 已付 FROM Has_Receivables AS h1 INNER JOIN View_Max_Flow_Form AS v1 ON h1.ACNumber = v1.ACNumber GROUP BY h1.ACNumber) AS hr ON ci.ACNumber = hr.ACNumber LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT 受理编号, SUM(变更总价) AS 变更总价 FROM ERP_Budget_Change WHERE (审核日期 >= '2009-12-31') GROUP BY 受理编号) AS bc ON ci.ACNumber = bc.受理编号 WHERE ((ci.actual_start_time BETWEEN #{0} AND #{1}) or (ci.end_balance BETWEEN #{0} AND #{1})) AND (ci.contract_id NOT LIKE 'W%') AND ci.contract_total > 0 AND ci.ACNumber not in ( SELECT ac_number from salary_project_commission where commission_state = 2) ORDER BY ci.state,designer

select isnull(f.designer, b.designer) as designer, f.first_commission, b.balance_commission from (select distinct designer, sum(isnull(first_commission,0))as first_commission from "salary_project_commission" where substring(convert(varchar ,first_commission_date,112), 1,6) = #{0} group by designer ) f full join (select distinct designer, sum(isnull(balance_commission,0)) as balance_commission from "salary_project_commission" where substring(convert(varchar ,balance_commission_date,112), 1,6) = #{0} group by designer) b on f.designer = b.designer

actual_start_time = #{actualStartTime},
actual_end_time = #{actualEndTime},
balance_time = #{balanceTime},
updated_time = #{updatedTime}
where ac_number = #{acNumber}
